ndor. He was anger and he wished kill some Decepticons. When he heard all n=
oyses  from battle field he took his blaster and ran out side he aimed Fire=

 stumbles sideways and lookes to see

ns and uses his jump jets to pop
  up into the air. The missiles land benea=
th him and throw him forward
  closer to the CF.
